ai-patthana12.13:3.1_1: it’s not easy to teach to thoughts.
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_2: It’s not easy to teach Dhamma to someone without consideration.
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_3: without consideration, you shouldn’t give a teaching.
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_4: I won’t give teachings to someone else’s presence. ...
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_5: Isn’t give a teaching to someone without rapture ...
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_6: There’s no need for the Buddha, or for the teaching.
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_7: There’s no fortunate, nor does he have someone else give the teaching,
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_8: He’s not able to teach the Dhamma for the welfare and happiness of the Sangha.
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_9: He should not give a teaching to anyone sitting on the seat spread out.
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_10: It’s not easy for someone else to make a teaching for the future.
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_11: He should not give a teaching for the guild;
ai-patthana12.13:3.1_12: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana12.13:5.1_0: don’t like to have someone else observe the truth,
